experiences.description: Leading the development of high-performance web experiences using React and GSAP. Spearheaded the redesign of the core product interface, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement. Mentored junior developers and established best practices for animation performance.

Developed and maintained complex web applications using Node.js and Vue.js. Implemented scalable backend services with PostgreSQL and Redis. Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing and real-time notifications.

Collaborated with design teams to translate Figma prototypes into pixel-perfect, responsive websites. Focused on accessibility (WCAG) and cross-browser compatibility. Built a reusable component library used across multiple client projects.

Assisted in the development of MVPs for various startups. Gained extensive experience in rapid prototyping and agile methodologies. Contributed to both frontend and backend tasks under the guidance of senior engineers.
Developed interactive educational tools for primary school students. Fixed bugs and improved internal dashboard performance. Learned the fundamentals of the software development lifecycle.
